actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention program for the fiscal years 1973 and 1974.

summary.text: Makes the following appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention, treatment and research programs for the fiscal year 1973 and 1974: (1) for fiscal year 1973, $10,000,000; (2) for fiscal year 1974, $20,000,000.

titles.title: A bill making appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention program for the fiscal years 1973 and 1974.
